definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: Results An incubation period was found in eye injury after the exposure to mustard gas.
sentences.chinese: 结果芥子气中毒眼部损伤具有潜伏期。

sentences.english: CONCLUSION Sulfur mustard can alter the protein expression patterns of mouse skin.
sentences.chinese: 结论芥子气染毒能诱导小鼠皮肤蛋白表达谱的改变。

sentences.english: The understanding of this pathological process is beneficial to the study of mustard gas poisoning and its treatment.
sentences.chinese: 了解此病理过程对研究芥子气中毒和治疗有重要意义。

sentences.english: Germans introduced mustard gas which interfered with the Allied artillery.
sentences.chinese: 德国使用芥子气干扰同盟军队的炮兵。

definition: a poison/a toxic agent/poison gas/a chemical weapon
poison gas/toxic gas/manifestation of passion, anger etc (Buddhism)
